items.sentence: Tom was caught cheating on the exam and was expelled from school.
Tom was much taller than I was when we were in elementary school.
Tom was sad because he was the only one not invited to the party.
Tom was sitting at his desk, flipping through an old photo album.
Tom was stabbed and died before they could get him to a hospital.
Tom woke up the children and told them it was time for breakfast.
I can\'t be in the same room as Tom without getting into a fight.
I can\'t believe how much things have changed since we were kids.
I can\'t think of a good reason why we should give Tom any money.
I changed my mind about dinner. I\'m not really hungry right now.
